Title: Graduation Day
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Matt Edsall, Hans Rodionoff, Lacey Marisa Friedman (executive story editor), Lauren Bans (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Erica's graduation, Barry's summer plans and Adam's relationship go awry.
